short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically stores Jisho searches on Context.Reviews for Anki export.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Context.Reviews aims to make studying Japanese more interesting by helping you learn the vocabulary you encounter! Words you find in native material are more memorable than drilling pre-made flashcard decks, not to mention more fun!

As you're reading any Japanese material of your choosing, look up sentences containing words you don't yet know on Jisho.org. This extension keeps track of any phrases you looked up so you can use them later on Context.Reviews and create beautiful Anki flashcards!
